Class: sofa.models.BasketItem

Defined in:
sofa-core/src/sofa.models.basketItem.js:2
Dependencies:
None
Package:
sofa-core
Package dependencies:
None

Installation

  1. Getting the source

    You can access this class by installing the sofa-core package. Installing this package is as easy as running one of the following commands:

    • Via npm:

      npm install sofa-core

    • Via Bower:

      bower install sofa-core

    • Via Git:

      git clone http://github.com/sofa/sofa-core

  2. Embedding the source

    After that, embed the distribution file in your HTML document.

    <script src="dist/sofa.core.js"></script>

    Don't forget that each package defines its own package dependencies. Make sure to embed their files too if needed.

  3. Use it!

    After that, create an instance of this service by using the `new` operator:

    var basketItem = new sofa.models.BasketItem();

Description

A basket item model that represents basket items. This model provides some methods to access information about the basket item such as the price or the variant id.

Methods

  • getPrice()

    Defined in sofa-core/src/sofa.models.basketItem.js:22

    Returns the price of the basket item depending on the variant.

    Returns

    float

    Price

  • getTotal()

    Defined in sofa-core/src/sofa.models.basketItem.js:36

    Returns the total price of the basket item considering the quantity.

    Returns

    float

    Total price

  • getVariantID()

    Defined in sofa-core/src/sofa.models.basketItem.js:50

    Returns the variant id of the basket item if it exists.

    Returns

    int

    Variant id.

  • getOptionID()

    Defined in sofa-core/src/sofa.models.basketItem.js:64

    Returns the option id of the basket item if it exists.

    Returns

    int

    Option id.
